document.full_text: the supreme court has granted a stay of execution for a convicted killer in arizona who was due to die by lethal injection on tuesday, but the inmate could still be executed this week if the court rejects a petition from his lawyers.
document.title: supreme court temporarily blocks arizona execution
lines_and_colors: the supreme court has granted a stay of execution for a convicted killer in arizona who was due to die by lethal injection on tuesday, but the inmate could still be executed this week if the court rejects a petition from his lawyers.
